title: Start
body:
Welcome to "A Magical Kyoko", a simple game for the Global Game Jam 2025.
You are Kyoko, a girl who is an actress in a magical girl series.
Shoot bubbles to defeat her enemies.
Use the directional keys to move and the space bar to shoot bubbles.
When the blue bar is full, you can use the special power.
Bubbles with certain special effects will appear from time to time.
And that's it, defeat as many enemies as you can...
Every so often more will start to appear.
Good luck.
<<NoStart>>
<<end>> end
